name: Detritus (ShadowOverseer)
description:
A game about the deep sea, holes, wretched things, and conversion.

Find and collect the sustenance that falls off the lords of the deep to grow your following. Their influence will transfigure your creatures into greater beings of higher power - but take care, for ascended creatures do not always have cause to follow your lead.

Controls:

  • Left Mouse to Select
    • +Ctrl to Subtract from Selection
    • +Shift to Add to Selection
  • Space or Middle Mouse to Deselect All
  • Scroll to Zoom
  • Right Mouse to Pan
  • Escape to Quit

Made for GMC Jam 39.

Credits:
Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com/
Music "Whale Song Cello and Whales, Dolphin sounds" by James Ahmann
